hadiths.text: Nu'man b. Bashir reported:My father brought me to Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) and said: I have donated this slave to my son. whereupon he said: Have you made (such) donation to every one or your sons? He said: No. Thereupon he (the-Holy Prophet) said: Then take him back

chapter.ara-name: باب كَرَاهَةِ تَفْضِيلِ بَعْضِ الأَوْلاَدِ فِي الْهِبَةِ
chapter.eng-name: It Is Disliked To Favor Some Of One's Children Over Others In Gift-Giving
